question: In the current study, we ask that you do which of the following?
a: Pay close attention to the instructions and minimize distractions.

question: Which of the following will determine your bonus payment?
a: Total points accumulated throughout various tasks during the study.
b: A computer algorithm will randomly select one of the experimental sections you completed and will then select one trial you completed to determine your final bonus payment.

question: If you need to take a rest break during this experiment you should do which of the following?
a: Try your best to take breaks during instruction sections when prompted.
b: Leave halfway through an experimental portion and try resetting the task using your “back” or “refresh” browser buttons.
